title: Experiential Learning-Based Nursing Simulation Curriculum

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational nursing theory and basic clinical skills
context.additional_context: Goal-oriented experiential learning to improve clinical judgment in a smartphone-centric, technology-limited environment

learning_goals: Through simulation scenarios, learners will analyze real-time changes in patient conditions and select appropriate nursing interventions.
Learners will enhance clinical judgment by applying the experiential learning cycle (experience-reflection-conceptualization-experimentation).
Through peer feedback and self-assessment, learners will identify areas for improvement in simulation performance outcomes.

resources: Simplified Patient Manikin and Consumables Set
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
